Description:
Stay on top of your inbox with the new Copilot voice experience in the Outlook mobile app. Copilot starts by summarizing your most recent unread emails and then suggests actions like flagging, pinning, archiving, deleting or drafting a reply â€“ all without the hassle of navigating your inbox by hand. You can interrupt or redirect Copilot at any point in the conversation.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: November CY2025
Title: Outlook: Triage your inbox on-the-go with Copilot voice for Outlook mobile
